title: Steadfast Love
phrases: Your steadfast love endures forever
Through the ages it remains
Like a river flowing onward
Your compassion never wanes
When the storms of life surround us
You are shelter from the rain
In Your presence we find comfort
You heal every hurt and pain
We will trust in You our Savior
We will rest in who You are
You're the anchor for our future
You're our bright and morning star
Hallelujah to the Father
Hallelujah to the Son
Hallelujah to the Spirit
Three in One the Holy One
May our lives be demonstrations
Of the love that You have shown
Till the day we stand before You
And we gather round Your throne
